sourcesContent:
import styles from './layout.module.scss' import { Link, Outlet, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { ChangeEvent, FormEvent, useMemo } from 'react' import { debounce } from 'lodash' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { inputValue, searchValue } from 'states/inputSearchValue' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import { getSearchListApi } from 'services/bookSearchApi' const Layout = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [input, setInput] = useRecoil(inputValue) const [search, setSearch] = useRecoil(searchValue) const { data } = useQuery( ['getSearchListApi', search, input], () => getSearchListApi(search, 1).then((res) => res.data), { enabled: !!search, } ) const debounceSearch = useMemo( () => debounce((value) => { setSearch(value) }, 1000), [setSearch] ) const handleChange = (e: ChangeEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget setInput(value) debounceSearch(value) } const handleSubmit = (e: FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() navigate(`searchresult/${input}`) setInput('') let searchStoreArray = store.get('searchStore') const tmpArray = searchStoreArray.filter((item: string) => item !== input) searchStoreArray = [...tmpArray, input] store.set('searchStore', searchStoreArray) } return (
오늘의책
  • Home
  • 추천도서
  • 이벤트
) } export default Layout
